feed.title: Ark Server Manager Version Feed
feed.subtitle: This is the Ark Server Manager release version feed.

ul.li: Mod Details Window - A new 'Timestamp' column has been added to shows the timestamp of the last time the mod was updated. This value is returned from the steam servers.

Mod Details Window - A new button has been added to each row. This button will allow you to manually set the value in the LastUpdatedASM.txt files. This should only be used if you MUST update a mod by manually copying the files.

Shutdown Reason Broadcast - A new option has been added to the global settings, that will broadcast the shutdown reason with every shutdown message. If disabled, the shutdown reason is only broadcast at the start of the shutdown.
Added Aberrant Direbear and Bigfoot versions. (thanks @spikeydragoon)

ARK 278.0 options added.
ServerAllowAnsel -> Administration section
AllowHideDamageSourceFromLogs -> Administration section
TribeNameChangeCooldown -> Rules section
RandomSupplyCratePoints -> Rules section
DisableWeatherFog -> Environment section
bHardLimitTurretsInRange -> Structures section
TamedDinoCharacterFoodDrainMultiplier -> Dino section
TamedDinoTorporDrainMultiplier -> Dino section
WildDinoCharacterFoodDrainMultiplier -> Dino section
WildDinoTorporDrainMultiplier -> Dino section
PassiveTameIntervalMultiplier -> Dino section
PreventOfflinePvPConnectionInvincibleInterval -> Rules section
